name: scrolling-gestures
title: Scrolling Gestures
description: Navigate your browser history with horizontal scrolling on your trackpad or mouse wheel, while still being able to scroll left and right.
author: nandhp

preferences.title: Gesture timeout
preferences.description: Maximum interval between scroll steps in milliseconds. (Higher number allows slower gestures.)
preferences.name: gestureTimeout

preferences.title: Gesture length
preferences.description: Length of the gesture in scroll steps.
preferences.name: gestureLength

preferences.title: Scroll inertia timeout
preferences.description: After detecting a gesture, do not repeat the action until this much time (in milliseconds) has passed since the last scroll step.
preferences.name: gestureUnlockTimeout

preferences.title: Show visual feedback
preferences.description: Show gesture progress via a sliding overlay.
preferences.name: gestureFeedback

preferences.title: Reverse direction
preferences.description: Reverse the meaning of left and right scrolling.
preferences.name: gestureReverse

preferences.title: Automatically close tabs
preferences.description: Close tabs automatically if going back and no history is available
preferences.name: gestureCloseTabs
